attributes.title: DO NOT GET IT
attributes.review: after downloading the app my phone glitched and I had to get a new one because it broke this app is bad I do not recommend

attributes.title: horrible!!!
attributes.review: i was just trying to be a good facebookuplician and help our president but the app was SO ugly and took forever to load. i will not be voting for trump come november .

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app was horrible it provides fake news and never leaves me alone!!! Please do not use this app complete waste of time!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: i was really hoping on learning more about the united states presidents campaign and read all the news story’s. BUT IT WAS ALL FALSE INFORMATION AND IT SO MANY BUGS. honestly VERY DISAPPOINTED could’ve done better honey. anyways stan twice ty <3 ✨f o r i g n e r✨

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Absolutely hate this app so much to many glitches and overall just a piece of trash!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I hate this app because when i downloaded it my shark escaped from his cage and attacked me and then ate my turtle 😡. Such horrblie content even scared my crocodile 🐊😾. My moms sisters cousins neighbors hate me now.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH
attributes.review: This app BROKE MY PHONE. I was simply trying to get the latest info on our lovely president yet I was met with disturbing adds and it crashed my phone. Not worth it.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: It’s an awful app and gave me diarrhea just from opening it. Don’t download it. Too many ads about dumb stuff.

attributes.title: This app doesn’t work
attributes.review: The app I downloaded doesn’t work right and keeps crashing.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: The app was racist, I have lots of diverse friends because I live in a very diverse place, the the app tried to tell me fake news about them and push a racist agenda. SAD!
